function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased electricity consumption during pandemic due to stay-at-home mandates","Impact":"Higher energy use leads to higher electricity bills, increasing financial burden on individuals","Mitigation":"Promote energy-saving practices and provide financial assistance for utility bills","Technologies":"Smart home energy management systems, energy-efficient appliances","People":"Individuals, particularly lower-income individuals","Owner":"Government, energy companies, community organizations"},{"Description":"Resemblance of electricity usage curve to that of coronavirus quarantines in U.S. and Europe","Impact":"Indicates a shift in daily routine and increased indoor activity, potentially leading to higher risk of contagious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Encourage ventilation, personal hygiene, and social distancing measures","Technologies":"Air purifiers, contactless technology, ventilation systems","People":"Communities, individuals in built environments","Owner":"Local authorities, building management, individuals"},{"Description":"Composition of energy usage groups reflecting demographic differences","Impact":"Certain demographic groups may be more vulnerable to the impacts of increased electricity use, including elderly, lower-income individuals, and females","Mitigation":"Targeted support and education for vulnerable groups, promote energy equity","Technologies":"Community outreach, energy assistance programs","People":"Vulnerable demographic groups","Owner":"Community organizations, government, energy companies"}]}
